```{r setup}
library(process.phenotypes)
```

If you are using [SurveyCTO](https://www.surveycto.com/) for your phenotype data collection,
we recommend generating configuration files from the form definition file used to configure
the SurveyCTO questionnaire. This can be accomplished within `process.phenotypes` by using the
function `parse.surveycto`.
